name: Stabill
description: A multi-platform cloud-based Checkbook app built with Flutter and Firebase. It syncs inputted transaction data across sessions in realtime and is used to manage finances for your bank accounts, creating a digital checkbook experience that you can access anywhere. Working builds are verified for Android and Web.

name: MouseMaze
description: Inspired by the idea of lab mice navigating mazes, MouseMaze is a Java program that generates mazes using a variety of algorithms. The maze creation process is animated, detailing exactly how the mazes reach their final state. Several options can be tweaked, including the type of algorithm used, generation speed, and the maze size.
